pinyin: qu3 qi2 jing1 hua2 , qu4 qi2 zao1 po4

definitions.qu3 qi2 jing1 hua2 , qu4 qi2 zao1 po4: take the cream, discard the dross (political and educational slogan); keep what is good, discard the rest; You need to be selective when studying.; In modernizing the country, don't accept uncritically all foreign ideas.;
